short_summary: RFP CCGS Limnos Propulsion Control and Alarm and Monitoring Systems Renewal
full_summary:
=====================================

### Title (English)
RFP for CCGS Limnos Propulsion Control and Alarm Monitoring Systems Renewal

### Title (French)
DPD pour l'immatriculation électrique du NGCC Limnos : renouvellement du système de commande de l'appareil de propulsion et du système d'alarme et de surveillance

### Reference Number
WS4272078598-Doc4272291018

### Solicitation Number
WS4272078598

### Tender Closing Date
March 19, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

### Solicitation Status
This tender is expired.

### Procurement Overview
This procurement is a competitive bidding process soliciting proposals from qualified contractors to supply and install propulsion control and alarm monitoring systems for the Canadian Coast Guard Ship (CCGS) Limnos.

### Key Details
*   The successful bidder will be expected to provide technical documentation and installation services.
*   The scope of work is outlined in the Statement of Work (Annex A).
*   The procurement will be conducted in accordance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
*   The contract will be awarded for a duration of approximately 15 months, starting from the signing date and terminating on October 30, 2025.
*   Any supporting documents or proposals submitted after the closing time will be considered non-conforming.

### Contact Information
For inquiries or submissions, please contact:

*   Hugh Slater, Contract Specialist, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Hugh Slater (SPAC/PSCP)
*   [Hugh.Slater@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:hugh.slater@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Tender Notice URL
Please visit the following link to access the tender notice: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17798894?extsite=MTc3OTg4OTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17798894?extsite=MTc3OTg4OTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Attachments
No attachments are available for this tender.

### Solicitation Type
This is a request for proposal (RFP) and will be conducted through open competitive bidding.

### Evaluation Criteria
The proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

### Notice Type
This is a request
